$BNB/USDT Bullish Breakout Continuation ‚Äì Long Entry Opportunity

BNB is showing strong bullish momentum on the lower timeframe, with price breaking above recent consolidation and holding above the key support zone near 900. The structure indicates higher lows and steady buying pressure, suggesting continuation toward the upper resistance area. As long as price sustains above the breakout level, upside movement remains favorable.

Entry: 902.50 ‚Äì 904.00
Target 1: 908.00
Target 2: 912.50
Target 3: 916.15
Stop-Loss: 895.70

Risk Management:
Use only 3‚Äì5% of your total capital on this trade. After Target 1 is achieved, shift the stop-loss to breakeven to protect profits and reduce risk.

Pro Tip:
Strong continuation is more reliable when price holds above 900 with rising volume. Avoid chasing pumps‚Äîprefer entries on small pullbacks near support for better risk-to-reward.

$BNB BNB at Channel Support: Z Wave or Start of a Larger Bullish Expansion?

BNB faced a strong support near to the lower boundary of the channel.
The price is expanding in a clear channel so far and we are in a possible Z wave.

However with the mess that Trump is creating it could be possible that the correction already finished.

Probably we are not only in a small Z wave but in a bigger bullish wave that can also invalidate this patter by pushing further with targets 954.30; 1020; 1070

You may find more details in the chart.
Thank you and good luck! üçÄ
